html:
5.14.17  3:03 am   should we be concerned about the future of our planet?

     sure, if we want to keep living here

5.14.17  3:00 am   are trees people

     not exactly

5.14.17  2:47 am   How do you open a pickle jar

     i'm not sure

5.14.17  2:36 am   Will you answer to all the question even If I tell you not to.

     there are too many questions to answer them all

5.14.17  2:35 am   How often do you get meaningful questions?

     there is meaning in every question
5.14.17  2:31 am   hi there bill! would you be willing to add "i'm crazy / it's raining" to your spotify? i'd be stoked and listen to it every day

5.14.17  2:23 am   spell ICUP

     you already did

5.14.17  2:10 am   why did u leave [country/event of special personal interest to asker] out of hotewig??? why didn't u make 80% of the video about [country/event of personal interest to asker]

     ah great question the answer is because i am stupid

5.14.17  2:05 am   Why didn't you mention the Australian Aboriginals in HOETWIG?

     the reason i didn't mention everything is because the video was less than 20 minutes

5.14.17  2:03 am   What would you call your aesthetic?

     aesthetic shouldn't need to be called, if it's working properly

5.14.17  1:56 am   Can you post more content pls, I will over my first born

     i will continue working on content constantly, without stopping, every day, for a long time, just as i have been doing for the last several years. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.14.17  1:52 am   how many times have you watched hotewig through (the finished one you uploaded)? .

     technically maybe zero, because the last things i fixed were very small things that didn't require watching the whole thing

5.14.17  1:45 am   what do you do with your day, bill? give us an average look at, say, a typical wednesday in the life of bill wurtz.

     urgently and swiftly make as much progress as possible on the current project

5.14.17  1:11 am   would you ever implement something regarding a message sent to the question submitter via email or the like to notify the asker that their question was answered

     i think that would require that i ask for email addresses, and i made the decision long ago that this will not be that kind of site

5.14.17  12:47 am   Why are things, things?

     why would they not be

5.14.17  12:41 am   Is there a way to search through your questions. I've been reading through two pages worth of questions and a few curious thoughts came into my head but instead of asking, I'd rather just read because I'm sure it's probably been asked before. Thanks!

     use cmd+F to search the page, use cmd-G to jump to each next occurence, and use cmd-down to jump to the bottom of the page and click previous, and do it again. if you use these 3 commands together you can find stuff very quickly, that's how i do it. if you are on a PC use ctrl instead of cmd. if you are on a phone i don't think you can do it

5.13.17  11:48 pm   hey bill are you glad of the universe

     oh hell yeah

5.13.17  11:35 pm   What is a chicken

     i'm not sure

5.13.17  11:29 pm   is all your stuff free?

     it can be free or not free, depending on what you are accustomed to
5.13.17  11:27 pm   tits or ass?
5.13.17  11:24 pm   how often do you have an existential crisis, if at all?
5.13.17  11:16 pm   im a rebel and not asking a question, this is a statement.

5.13.17  11:16 pm   what is your favorite type of pizza?

     ghost pizza

5.13.17  11:00 pm   why did you put the q in 'ueqstions' specifically between the e and s?

     i guess it's close enough to home that you know where it comes from, but far enough to still feel like an adventure

5.13.17  10:43 pm   Is there any way to request/commission a jingle from you?

     there is a long waiting list

5.13.17  10:42 pm   How many questions have been asked so far?

     it's no longer possible to count them but i think somewhere around 50,000

5.13.17  10:40 pm   what specifically do you ponder about when you think about the ground?

     its shape, and size

5.13.17  9:49 pm   Can you make a history of Canada since you ignored it in your history of world episode

     i left out a lot more than canada

5.13.17  9:15 pm   how do you feel about australia

     good

5.13.17  9:12 pm   weirdest fact u know?

     there's life on this planet

5.13.17  8:56 pm   Are you an extrovert?

     not exactly

5.13.17  8:55 pm   How much do you really want to fly?

     very much

5.13.17  8:54 pm   Does YouTube sustain you financially?

     no

5.13.17  8:53 pm   Do you think this page is poorly programmed?

     no

5.13.17  8:51 pm   On a scale from 1 to 10, how much do you enjoy human interaction?

     10

5.13.17  8:45 pm   what thing did you want to do at some point but learned that it is very hard/unrealistic

     be normal

5.13.17  8:39 pm   If you could make one tv channel. What would it be?

     why can't i make a channel outside the tv

5.13.17  8:31 pm   Are you single? If yeah, when will you date me? If nah, how can I get you to date me?

     advanced military tactics

5.13.17  8:29 pm   whats 1 + 2 = ? This is important i have math homework i need to finish

     3

5.13.17  8:25 pm   hey are you stupid

     i will check

5.13.17  8:10 pm   I am a person

     me too
5.13.17  8:02 pm   what is your favourite animal?

5.13.17  8:00 pm   Favorite entertainment medium?

     the time space continuum

5.13.17  6:52 pm   do you read every question?

     no

5.13.17  6:10 pm   How do I music

     you have to make up your own way!
5.13.17  6:03 pm   Have you ever thought about doing colabs with other content creators? If so, who?

5.13.17  6:00 pm   how to deal with feeling inferior to the people around you?

     become better than them
5.13.17  5:58 pm   Why did you spell questions "uequestions" ?

5.13.17  5:54 pm   Do you think dice are a great form of random chance for selecting garden hoses , or is a coin more suitable for random chance of garden hoses? Or if you want, give a suggestion of a form of random chance. There are 36 garden hoses I am looking at.

     go to random.org and type 1, and 36 in the boxes, and press the button

5.13.17  5:51 pm   You had one job, you just had to spell "Thank You" on the webpage you're redirected to after sending a question....

     that is not my job. sorry for the confusion

      Yet you wrote 'Thabk You'
